snippet: Aleksei A. Navalny, who was freed pending an appeal of his embezzlement conviction, has returned to a quixotic campaign to challenge the political system established by President Vladimir V. Putin.
abstract: Aleksei A Navalny, Russian lawyer turned blogger, has returned to quixotic campaign to challenge political system erected by Pres Vladimir V Putin just weeks after his release from jail following conviction on embezzlement charges; Navalny's victory seems improbable, but his campaign has shaken up country's moribund election system.
lead_paragraph: Aleksei A. Navalny, who was freed pending an appeal of his embezzlement conviction, has returned to a quixotic campaign to challenge the political system established by President Vladimir V. Putin.

headline.main: Kremlin Critic Goes From Jail to Trail
headline.print_headline: Kremlin Critic Goes From Jail to Trail
